plugin.name: CleftMUSH Mapper
plugin.author: Asmodeus
plugin.description: This is the official CleftMUSH Graphical Mapper.

plugin.name: CleftMUSH Group Monitor Window
plugin.author: Asmodeus and Elisius
plugin.description: Displays hp/mana/move gauges for you, your group, and your enemies.

plugin.name: CleftMUSH Big Gauges
plugin.author: Asmodeus
plugin.description: Displays hp/mana/move/exp/enemy/alignment gauges. The right-click menu offers major customization functionality.

plugin.name: CleftMUSH Chat Window
plugin.author: Asmodeus and Fiendish
plugin.description: Displays all communications in a window. Tabs can be added to the window, and channels assigned to new tabs.
